property.name: code
property.description: The identifier of the Voucher. This is the first part of voucher code which holds first 3 letters, like: 123

property.name: voucherCode
property.description: Voucher code, is the holder for keeping specific occasional voucher related to business usage. It can be generated and looks like: 123-H8BC-Y3D5-34AL

property.name: value
property.description: Value of the voucher. Example of such value is: 15.0d

property.name: valueString
property.description: The value of the voucher to display. Example: 15.0%

property.name: freeShipping
property.description: Specifies if the order this voucher is applied to is shipped for free (true) or not (false). Defaults to false.

property.name: appliedValue
property.description: Applied value when using this voucher

property.name: isocode
property.description: Code of the currency in iso format

property.name: active
property.description: Boolean flag whether currency is active

property.name: value
property.description: Value of price in BigDecimal format

property.name: minQuantity
property.description: Minimum quantity of the price value

property.name: maxQuantity
property.description: Maximum quantity of the price value

property.name: maxPrice
property.description: Maximum value of the Price Range

property.name: minPrice
property.description: Minium value of the Price Range

property.name: startDate
property.description: The initial date of the promotion

property.name: endDate
property.description: Last date of validity of the promotion

property.name: couldFireMessages
property.description: Message about promotion which is displayed when planning potential promotion. This field has higher priority over promotion description

property.name: firedMessages
property.description: Message fired while the promotion is active. This is info how much you will get when applying the promotion

property.name: enabled
property.description: Boolean flag if promotion is enabled

property.name: priority
property.description: Priority index as numeric value of the promotion. Higher number means higher priority

property.name: imageType
property.description: Type of the image, can be PRIMARY or GALLERY

property.name: format
property.description: Format of the image, can be zoom, product, thumbnail, store, cartIcon, etc.

property.name: altText
property.description: Tooltip content which is visible while image mouse hovering

property.name: galleryIndex
property.description: Index of the image while displayed in gallery

bean.description: Representation of an Abstract Catalog Item

property.name: url
property.description: Url address of abstract catalog item

property.name: purchasable
property.description: Flag defining if product is purchasable

property.name: availableForPickup
property.description: Flag defining if product is available for pickup

property.name: numberOfReviews
property.description: Number of reviews associated with the product

property.name: images
property.description: List of images linked to product

property.name: categories
property.description: List of categories product belongs to

property.name: reviews
property.description: List of reviews associated with the product

property.name: classifications
property.description: List of classifications related to the product

property.name: potentialPromotions
property.description: List of potential promotions related to the product

property.name: variantOptions
property.description: List of variant options related to the product

property.name: baseOptions
property.description: List of base options related to the product

property.name: volumePricesFlag
property.description: Flag stating if volume price should be displayed

property.name: variantMatrix
property.description: List of variant matrixes associated with the product

property.name: priceRange
property.description: Price range assigned to the product

property.name: multidimensional
property.description: Flag stating if product is multidimentional

property.name: configuratorType
property.description: Configurator type related to the product

property.name: configurable
property.description: Flag stating if product is configurable

property.name: isValueRounded
property.description: Indicate whether Stock level value is rounded

property.name: formattedDate
property.description: Date of future stock expressed in text value

property.name: features
property.description: List of features for given classification

property.name: comparable
property.description: Flag defining it feature is comparable

property.name: stock
property.description: Stock value of the variant option

property.name: url
property.description: Url address of the variant option

property.name: priceData
property.description: Price data information of the variant option

bean.description: Representation of a Variant Option Qualifier

property.name: image
property.description: Image associated with variant option qualifier

bean.description: Representation of a status summary, an aggregated view on issues for a specific status or severity. These issues are attached to configurations of products or order entries

property.name: status
property.description: Status or severity indicator, can be one of ERROR, WARNING, INFO or SUCCESS

bean.description: Representation of a Configuration Info List

property.name: preselected
property.description: Flag stating if product reference is preselected

bean.description: Representation of a Product Reference List
Representation of a Variant Matrix Element

property.name: variantValueCategory
property.description: Variant value category for variant matrix element

property.name: parentVariantCategory
property.description: Parent variant category for variant matrix element

property.name: variantOption
property.description: Variant option for variant matrix element

property.name: elements
property.description: List of elements with the type of variant matrix element

bean.description: Representation of a Variant Value Category

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the variant value category

property.name: sequence
property.description: Sequence number of variant value category

property.name: superCategories
property.description: Parent category of variant value category

property.name: hasImage
property.description: Flag if varian category has image assigned

bean.description: Representation of an UserSignUp. Consists of fields required to register new customer

property.name: uid
property.description: user id, unique string required to create new user. It can be email

property.name: nativeName
property.description: name the language in native form

property.name: active
property.description: true/false indicator when the language is active

bean.description: Lists all available languages (all languages used for a particular store). If the list of languages for a base store is empty, a list of all languages available in the system will be returned

property.name: languages
property.description: This is the list of Language fields that should be returned in the response body

bean.description: Representation of an User Group List

property.name: token
property.description: token value which will be generated as unique string that will be sent with email to allow user for completing reset-password operation

property.name: newPassword
property.description: new password string which is required to complete process of resetting password

bean.description: Representation of an Order History List

property.name: selected
property.description: Flag stating when Sort is selected

bean.description: Representation of a search query pagination

property.name: pageSize
property.description: The number of results per page. A page may have less results if there are less than a full page of results, only on the last page in the results

property.name: currentPage
property.description: The current page number. The first page is number zero (0), the second page is number one (1), and so on

bean.description: Representation of a search results pagination

property.name: totalPages
property.description: The total number of pages. This is the number of pages, each of pageSize, required to display the totalResults.

property.name: totalResults
property.description: The total number of matched results across all pages

bean.description: Representation of a Product Express Update Element

property.name: code
property.description: Code of product express update element

bean.description: Representation of a Product Express Update Element List

property.name: productExpressUpdateElements
property.description: List of product express update element

bean.description: Representation of an Order Status Update Element

property.name: code
property.description: Code of update element of order status

bean.description: Representation of an Order Status Update Element List

property.name: orderStatusUpdateElements
property.description: List of order status update elements

bean.description: Representation of a Card Type List

property.name: net
property.description: Flag stating iv value is net-value

property.name: calculated
property.description: Flag showing if order is calculated

property.name: pickupOrderGroups
property.description: List of pickup order entry group

property.name: deliveryOrderGroups
property.description: List of delivery order entries group

property.name: potentialOrderPromotions
property.description: List of potential order promotions for cart

property.name: potentialProductPromotions
property.description: List of potential product promotions for cart

property.name: savedBy
property.description: Information about person who saved cart

bean.description: Representation of a Cart modification list

property.name: startMonth
property.description: Start month from which payment is valid

property.name: startYear
property.description: Start year from which payment is valid

property.name: saved
property.description: Flag to mark if payment is saved one

property.name: defaultPayment
property.description: Flag to mark if payment the default one

property.name: billingAddress
property.description: Address details to be considered as billing address

bean.description: Representation of a Payment details list
Representation of a Delivery mode list

property.name: guestCustomer
property.description: Flag showing if customer is Guest customer

property.name: cancellable
property.description: Boolean flag showing if order is cancellable

property.name: returnable
property.description: Boolean flag showing if order is returnable

property.name: entryNumber
property.description: Entry number of the order entry

property.name: quantity
property.description: Quantity number of items in order entry

property.name: basePrice
property.description: Base price of order entry item

property.name: totalPrice
property.description: Total price of order entry item

property.name: updateable
property.description: Flag defining if order entry item is updateable

property.name: statusSummaryList
property.description: List of aggregated status information per entry, relevant if the entry is configurable and its configuration contains one or many issues in different severities. Note that configurators typically raise such issues only in case the parent document is changeable. In this case the issues (depending on their severity) need to be fixed before a checkout can be done. This means this segment can be present for a cart entry, for order entries it will always be empty

property.name: deliveryPointOfService
property.description: Point of service associated with order entry

property.name: cancelledItemsPrice
property.description: Total price of cancelled items which belong to the order entry item

property.name: cancellableQuantity
property.description: Quantity number of cancellable items in order entry

property.name: returnedItemsPrice
property.description: Total price of returned items which belong to the order entry item

property.name: returnableQuantity
property.description: Quantity number of returnable items in order entry

bean.description: Representation of an Order entry list consumed
Representation of a Promotion order entry consumed

property.name: adjustedUnitPrice
property.description: Adjusted unit price for promotion order entry

property.name: erroneous
property.description: Indicates if the entry group is in an error state

property.name: type
property.description: Indicates type of the group, possible values are STANDALONE, CONFIGURABLEBUNDLE or any customer implemented type for any new provider

bean.description: Representation of an Order Entry Group

property.name: quantity
property.description: Quantity of order entries in a group

bean.description: Representation of a Pickup Order Entry Group
Representation of a Delivery Order Entry Group

property.name: deliveryAddress
property.description: Delivery address for order entry group

property.name: promotion
property.description: Promotion information for given promotion result

property.name: consumedEntries
property.description: List of promotion order entries consumed

Representation of a Point of service

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the point of service

property.name: displayName
property.description: Display name of the point of service

property.name: url
property.description: Url address of the point of service

property.name: description
property.description: Description of the point of service

property.name: openingHours
property.description: Opening hours of point of service

property.name: storeContent
property.description: Store content of given point of service

property.name: features
property.description: List of features for a given point of service

property.name: geoPoint
property.description: Geopoint localization info about point of service

property.name: formattedDistance
property.description: Distance to the point of service as text value

property.name: distanceKm
property.description: Distance to the point of service as number value

property.name: mapIcon
property.description: Image associated with the point of service

property.name: address
property.description: Address information of point of service

property.name: storeImages
property.description: Collection of images associated with a point of service

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on address data. The DTO is in XML or .json format

property.name: id
property.description: Unique id value of the address which is optional while creating new address. While performing other address operations this value is the key

property.name: firstName
property.description: First name of the address person

property.name: lastName
property.description: Last name of the address person

property.name: shippingAddress
property.description: Boolean flag if address is for shipping

property.name: defaultAddress
property.description: Boolean flag if address is default

property.name: visibleInAddressBook
property.description: Boolean flag if address is visible in the Address Book

property.name: formattedAddress
property.description: Boolean flag if address is formatted

bean.description: Response body fields which will be returned while fetching the list of countries. The DTO is in XML or .json format

property.name: countries
property.description: This is the list of Country fields that should be returned in the response body

bean.description: Response body fields which will be returned while fetching the list of country's regions.

property.name: isocode
property.description: Country and Region code in iso format

property.name: isocodeShort
property.description: Region code in short iso form

property.name: regions
property.description: This is the list of Region fields that should be returned in the response body

property.name: hour

property.name: weekDay
property.description: Text representation of week day opening day

property.name: closed
property.description: Flag stating if weekday opening day is closed

property.name: orderEntryNumber
property.description: Order entry number of the cancelled product

property.name: quantity
property.description: Quantity of the product which belongs to the order entry and is requested to be cancelled

property.name: cancellationRequestEntryInputs
property.description: Cancellation request entry inputs which contain information about the order entries which are requested to be cancelled

bean.description: Representation of a return request entry which contains information about the returned product

property.name: orderEntry
property.description: Order entry related to the return request entry

property.name: expectedQuantity
property.description: Quantity which is expected to be returned for this return request entry

bean.description: Representation of a return request for an order

property.name: cancellable
property.description: Boolean flag for whether the return request is cancellable

property.name: creationTime
property.description: Date of the return request creation

property.name: order
property.description: Order related to the return request

property.name: refundDeliveryCost
property.description: Boolean flag for whether there is a delivery cost for refund

property.name: returnEntries
property.description: Entries of the return request which contains information about the returned product

bean.description: Representation of a return request entry input for an order

property.name: orderEntryNumber
property.description: Order entry number of the returned product

property.name: quantity
property.description: Quantity of the product which belongs to the order entry and is requested to be returned

property.name: orderCode
property.description: Code of the order which return request is related to

property.name: returnRequestEntryInputs
